definition: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Plain of two-thirds of the total.
sentences.chinese: 平原佔總面積的三分之二。

sentences.english: Hence, future generations may have a stronger demand for wilderness areas than current generations .
sentences.chinese: 現在和未來的幾代人對荒野面積的需求會更強烈。

sentences.english: Enlarging the sectional area of surge tank obviously changes minimum pressure in draft tube.
sentences.chinese: 增大調壓室面積會明顯改變尾水管最小壓力值。

sentences.english: The huge surface area of activated charcoal gives it countless bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭巨大的表面積提供了大量的活性位點。

sentences.english: Here you should slide the screen area bar to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，您應該幻燈片屏幕面積大律師公會到左邊。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 從土地利用變化來看，舞水河流域耕地面積不斷擴大。

sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.
sentences.chinese: 四川省平昌縣已累計治理水土流失面積782。

sentences.english: The per unit area yield of ginned cotton has increased by 10% over last year.
sentences.chinese: 皮棉的單位面積產量比去年增加了10%。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the validity of decompressive hemicraniectomy of massive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討去骨辨減壓術治療大面積腦梗死的有效性。

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面積植樹造林綠化國土是跨世紀中國的一大課題。

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the airport is the single largest building, by floor space.
sentences.chinese: 機場的3號航站樓按佔地面積來說是最大的獨立建築。

sentences.english: It's a pretty small campus, so there are multiple campuses.
sentences.chinese: 這個校區面積不大，所以學校有許多不同的校區。

sentences.english: Plateaus and mountains make up 60 per cent of China's total area.
sentences.chinese: 高原和山地佔中國總面積的百分之六十。

sentences.english: We can compute the circular area with radius.
sentences.chinese: 我們能用半徑計算出圓的面積。

sentences.english: Fruit trees, large patio area, Walnut school dist.
sentences.chinese: 果樹，庭院面積大，是屬於核桃學區。

definition: unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
